[URLOTW] The System Design Primer

Jan 11, 2020 ・ 1 min read

URLOTW or URL of the week or Uniform Resource Locator of the week is a kind of post where I share a relevant URL for you :-)

This week the winner is The System Design Primer: https://github.com/donnemartin/system-design-primer.

If you’re reviewing your system design skills, this is a must-read repository for you :-)

I hope you enjoy it!
